活動詳細內容
參加對象■在校生
活動名稱(Online 線上) ESP Lunch Gathering 第3場：6/5
活動地點meet.google.com/cey-vgzb-cou
報名日期時間2024/05/20(一) 00:00 ~ 2024/06/03(一) 00:00
活動日期時間2024/06/05(三) 12:15~13:00
活動說明
Are you lacking confidence in discussing course topics in English with your classmates? 
Do you wish to effortlessly grasp the key points and interact in an English-taught classroom? 
Come join our English for Specific Purposes Lunch Gathering! 
We will cover various topics, including business, psychology, and technology, guided by international students. You'll gain insights into the topics and key vocabulary, while also practicing group discussions and presentations!
Registration is free, but seats are limited. 
Register now!


We're excited to announce three upcoming gatherings. Mark your calendars and join us for these enriching discussions:

Topic: Science and Technology
Date: June 5
Time: 12:10 PM - 1:00 PM
Online: meet.google.com/cey-vgzb-cou
Description: Science seeks to explain natural phenomena and understand the universe's fundamental laws, While technology harnesses this knowledge to create solutions that address human needs and enhance the quality of life.
報名人數正取：20人
候補人數候補：0人
